journal.title: Task Completed: Audit doc helper + schema needs
journal.author: claude-code
journal.content:
Comprehensive audit completed of doc helper functions and schema requirements for prepare-task integration.

Key findings:
1. Reviewed existing doc_helper.py with 3 main functions: check_doc_query_available(), check_sdd_integration_available(), get_task_context_from_docs()
2. Analyzed sdd_integration.py providing SDDContextGatherer class with methods: get_task_context(), suggest_files_for_task(), find_similar_implementations(), get_test_context(), get_impact_analysis()
3. Confirmed prepare_task() in discovery.py already calls get_task_context_from_docs() and includes doc_context in result payload
4. Reviewed analysis/prepare-task-default-context.md documenting contract v1-v3 evolution and context payload structure
5. Identified required inputs for doc queries: task description (title + details), optional file_path, spec_id (for context)
6. Documented schema additions needed: doc_context block with files[], dependencies[], similar[], complexity{}, plus availability messaging

Current integration status: Basic doc_context already exists in prepare-task but returns minimal structure from get_task_context_from_docs(). Schema can be enhanced to match rich SDDContextGatherer.get_task_context() output format.

Files analyzed:
- src/claude_skills/claude_skills/common/doc_helper.py (294 lines)
- src/claude_skills/claude_skills/doc_query/sdd_integration.py (453 lines)  
- src/claude_skills/claude_skills/sdd_next/discovery.py (prepare_task function)
- analysis/prepare-task-default-context.md (existing contract analysis)

Verified: sdd doc scope --plan and --implement presets available for contextual queries
Verified: sdd-integration CLI commands work (task-context, suggest-files, similar, test-context, impact)

No blockers. Ready for task-1-2 design phase.
